entry.title: Hello World
entry.content:
Welcome to my new blog, hope you will have a lot of fun here !

Let’s get started by introducing myself…

My name is Vu Xuan Duong, from Vietnam. Currently I am working as a software developer for a software company in Vietnam. I was studying in Japan for 2 years, so I can speak Japanese pretty well. I dont mind if you leave a comment in English, Japanese or Vietnamese.

Currently I want to learn Visual C++ for programming in Windows Enviroment due to job requirement. I am C related language lover but also concern in web programming (both server and client side). I was taking advance in researching about Internet Security in my university. Therefore, it would be glad to see/ share something about security issues in my blog.

Have fun !

nobita-isc

May 12, 2013
